profiles.title: FNRB3 Cat D7H vs. D7G roadbuilding trial
profiles.description: 1985 MacMillan Bloedel field evaluation comparing Cat D7H and D7G bulldozers for subgrade construction.
recommendations: Prefer D7H (longer, wider undercarriage) when soils are soft or when the dozer doubles as a winch-assist anchor mover.

profiles.title: ADV4N7 soil compaction thresholds
profiles.description: FPInnovations ADV4N7 guidance on limiting soil disturbance during road and landing construction.
recommendations: Maintain slash mats or corduroy when traffic would otherwise exceed ~20% compacted area on moist soils.
Delay construction or use low-ground-pressure equipment when soil moisture approaches field capacity.
